casebody.data:
Hattie H. Farrell, as Administratrix, etc., Respondent v. Arthur J. Horgan, et al., Appellant. Decided May 4, 1891. Appeal by defendants, from judgment entered on verdict of jury and from order denying motion for a new trial made upon the judge’s minutes. Edward W. S. Johnston, for appellants. Alfred Steckler and Charles Steckler, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Freedman, J.

Per Curiam.

Judgment and order affirmed, with costs.
